[Source: TidyTuesday (week 2022-03-08)](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday)  
*Original data: Erasmus+ mobility stats (sourced from Data.Europa).*

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
erasmus <- read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-03-08/erasmus.csv"
)

top_receive <- erasmus |>
  count(receiving_city, name = "n") |>
  arrange(desc(n))|>
  slice_head(n=15)

  ggplot(top_receive, aes(x = reorder(receiving_city, n), y = n,)) +
  geom_col(fill="navy") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "City", y = "Number of Students",
       title = "Top 15 Erasmus Receiving Cities in 2022")

```
